title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. [Please provide steps to reproduce the issue.]
EB: If you name a file 'foo.txt' in project 1 and another file 'foo.txt' in project 2, when you try to export these files to a zip file, the operation fails.
SR: Expected behavior: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
